name: Awesome Cupcake Chef Maker - Pastry Food Baking
name_original: Awesome Cupcake Chef Maker - Pastry Food Baking
description:
DELICIOUS CUPCAKES!! Build your own tasty treat in this fun and addicting maker!

Fun features include:
*Tons of YUMMY flavors to choose for your cupcakes!
*Create your own batter from scratch by mixing ingredients!
*Place cupcake in oven tray and remember the timer!
*Top off your cupcake with icing, candies, & more!
*Decorations include: unique flavored creams, icing, frosting, sprinkles, candies & so much more!


This game is suitable for all ages! Don't wait, download and start baking!





[Note]
-This game is free to play but offers in-app purchases made with real money.
